EmailTemplate.name: GIS 2013
EmailTemplate.subject: New GIS Signup 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
New GIS Sign up
Dear Claire
A young person in your area has signed up using a Graduate Incentive Scheme code. Please follow up their application to ensure they have paid, and contact the graduate to thank them and confirm their reward is being sent to them.
Click here to view the young person's Salesforce record: {!Contact.Link}.
WWW.THE-CHALLENGE.ORG /thechallengeNETWORK
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
